description:
It`s Valentine`s Day in the city, but everyone`s smartphones are in danger! Updating Waffle OS, the operating system used by 70% of the world`s phones, is causing them to freeze up and die...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Net no Umi ga Dai Pinch! "Toki" wa Kita, Kyoku App Gattai!!
The Sea of the `Net in Trouble! The `Time` Has Come: Ultimate App Fusion!
ネットの海が大ピンチ! 『トキ』は来た, 極アプ合体!!
